name: NISHABDHA SEVA TRUST
briefDescription: Nishabdha Seva Trust is a registered public charitable trust head quartered in Chennai, India. The main objective of the Trust is to cater to the genuine needs of those who approach the Trustees for help and support. Nishabdha's Core services are Health,Education and Empowerment for all ie to provide World class Fee less Education and Health with care.The Trust helps one to study or work in his or her lines of passion with a motto "Work builds, charity destroys". The Trust provides medical help to all those unreached especially for transplantations like Bone Marrow, Kidney, Liver, etc. Nishabdha is for innovation on 2 areas - World class FEELESS EDUCATION AND HEALTH with care for all.
